definition: A set of skills and knowledge related to creating and designing computer programs, typically involving the ability to write, debug, and maintain code. It encompasses understanding programming concepts, algorithms, and data structures, as well as proficiency in using programming languages and development tools. These skills are commonly utilized in software development, coding projects, and computer science fields.

examples.german: Programmierkenntniß ist eine wichtige Fähigkeit in der heutigen Welt.
examples.english: Programming knowledge is an important skill in today's world.

examples.german: Programmierkenntniß kann zu vielen beruflichen Möglichkeiten führen.
examples.english: Programming knowledge can lead to many career opportunities.

examples.german: Sie hat ihre Programmierkenntniß durch Selbststudium erworben.
examples.english: She acquired her programming knowledge through self-study.
